alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL CLERMONT, CENTRAL BROWN AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 930 AM EDT... At 900 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Mount Orab, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Mount Orab, Williamsburg, Sardinia, Russellville, Hamersville, Mowrystown, Greenbush, Lake Waynoka, State Route 32 at US Route 68, Fincastle, State Route 32 at US Route 62, New Hope, Locust Ridge and Buford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
